Free Online Marketing Courses

What are you looking for?

Search

Marketing

PR

Rita Cidre

5 lessons

16 minutes

Certification

Emoji Marketing Mini-Course
Happy World Emoji Day from us at Semrush! Master the foundations and execution of a successful emoji marketing strategy! This course will guide you through the essentials of emojis, practical examples of when and where to use them, and some fun facts to tie it all together. Learn one of the easiest ways to enhance your brand's communication and engagement!

View course info

Start learning

Career

Olivia Mae Hanlon

15 lessons

1 hour

Certification

Get a Job in Digital Marketing (with no experience)
The demand for digital marketers is skyrocketing, and there are so many exciting career opportunities to explore. But how do you get your first job with no prior experience? Our course is designed to equip you with all the essential knowledge and practical tips to secure your first job in digital marketing.

View course info

Start learning

AI

Marketing

Michael Olaye

15 lessons

1 hour

Certification

Become an AI-Powered Marketer
Marketers are being asked to do more with less every day. AI can make this possible, but how? This course covers the most practical and immediate ways marketers increase productivity and success with AI. You'll learn how to level up your prompts and dive into core use cases for AI in marketing: strategy development, campaigns, and content creation. All the while, you'll take a peek into the AI tools and strategies top marketers are using today.

View course info

Start learning

E-commerce

Sales

Vanhishikha Bhargava

6 lessons

36 minutes

Certification

How to Increase Sales on Shopify with Content Marketing
Delve into the essential concepts and actionable techniques that will empower you to leverage content marketing effectively to fuel the growth of your Shopify store. This course covers everything from understanding the fundamentals of content marketing to hands-on strategies for creating compelling content.

View course info

Leadership & People Management
Elevate your leadership skills with our course on effective people management. Gain a dynamic and practical approach to developing the skills necessary to lead teams with confidence and efficiency!

How To Plan a Magnetic Content Strategy Using Semrush
Unlock the secrets of a compelling Semrush-driven content strategy. Learn to captivate your audience with strategic keyword selection, in-depth planning, and optimized content that acts as an irresistible magnet for increased website traffic and reader engagement.
